message: Hello Bob, I'm interested in selling this product. I believe it would be highly valuable to you. I'm offering it for $14,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me.  This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will benefit you greatly. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I'm still not sure I'm comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $12,500, but that's as high as I can go. I'm still not sure if it's worth the cost for me.
